tasks.label: Cleanup dev ports
args: $ports = @(3000,3001,5000,5001); foreach ($port in $ports) { $pids = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $port -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique; foreach ($processId in $pids) { Stop-Process -Id $processId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }; $lockPath = Join-Path "${workspaceFolder}" "frontend/.next/dev/lock"; if (Test-Path $lockPath) { Remove-Item $lockPath -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }
